title: 什么插件能屏蔽后台的一些报错信息，类似disable moving tooquickly这种。
author: wjtcc
txt_content:
比如说这种：

2013-06-15 10:58:54 [SEVERE] ======================= Start Netty Debug Log =======================
2013-06-15 10:58:54 [SEVERE] Error caught whilst handling [id: 0xc4dc2522, /221.216.163.25:29579 => /112.123.174.150:25565]
java.io.IOException: 远程主机强迫关闭了一个现有的连接。
 at sun.nio.ch.SocketDispatcher.read0(Native Method)
 at sun.nio.ch.SocketDispatcher.read(Unknown Source)
 at sun.nio.ch.IOUtil.readIntoNativeBuffer(Unknown Source)
 at sun.nio.ch.IOUtil.read(Unknown Source)
 at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.read(Unknown Source)
 at io.netty.buffer.PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.setBytes(PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.java:259)
 at io.netty.buffer.AbstractByteBuf.writeBytes(AbstractByteBuf.java:885)
 at io.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioSocketChannel.doReadBytes(NioSocketChannel.java:226)
 at io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioByteChannel$NioByteUnsafe.read(AbstractNioByteChannel.java:72)
 at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKey(NioEventLoop.java:434)
 at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeys(NioEventLoop.java:397)
 at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:327)
 at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$2.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:109)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
2013-06-15 10:58:54 [SEVERE] ======================= End Netty Debug Log =======================


还有这种
2013-06-15 00:56:07 [SEVERE] Could not pass event EntityTargetEvent to Giants v5.0
org.bukkit.event.EventException
 at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:363)
 at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62)


告诉我插件名字或者网址就行
 at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.fireEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:479)

replies.author: 大刘
replies.txt_content:
这是服务端插件报错..说明插件有问题或者服务器过载了...
应该是无法屏蔽

replies.author: wjtcc
replies.txt_content:
大刘 发表于 2013-6-16 18:23 
这是服务端插件报错..说明插件有问题或者服务器过载了...
应该是无法屏蔽
那你能看出来前一个报错是什么问题吗？
我很少见到有插件报错提示中文的

disablemovingtooquickly 就能屏蔽移动过快的报错

replies.author: 大刘
replies.txt_content:
wjtcc 发表于 2013-6-16 19:11 
那你能看出来前一个报错是什么问题吗？
我很少见到有插件报错提示中文的
看不出
表示网页控制台自动折叠起报错信息的路过
